## Public Member Functions

### eliminateCallFramePseudoInstr() {#a8ed106468388a207cc54827d72867ddc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineBasicBlock::iterator NVPTXFrameLowering::eliminateCallFramePseudoInstr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method is called during prolog/epilog code insertion to eliminate call frame setup and destroy pseudo instructions (but only if the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> is using them).

It is responsible for eliminating these instructions, replacing them with concrete instructions. This method need only be implemented if using call frame setup/destroy pseudo instructions. Returns an iterator pointing to the instruction after the replaced one.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxframelowering-h/#l00031">31</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxframelowering-h">NVPTXFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxframelowering-cpp/#l00087">87</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxframelowering-cpp">NVPTXFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</MemberDefinition>

### getFrameIndexReference() {#acafaf5b04f0664b35c2b2c3d83f2de27}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>StackOffset NVPTXFrameLowering::getFrameIndexReference (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, int FI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &amp; FrameReg) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
getFrameIndexReference - This method should return the base register and offset used to reference a frame index location.

Returns the displacement from the frame register to the stack frame of the specified index, along with the frame register used (in output arg FrameReg).

The offset is returned directly, and the base register is returned via FrameReg.

This is the default implementation which is overridden for some targets.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxframelowering-h/#l00027">27</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxframelowering-h">NVPTXFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxframelowering-cpp/#l00074">74</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxframelowering-cpp">NVPTXFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
